name: Charlotte Oven
text: Activate: Main You may rest this Character: Declare a cost of your choice and reveal the top card of your opponent's deck. If the revealed card has the same cost as the declared cost, KO up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with an original cost of 3 or less. Then, add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and rest it.
